"Oh, hey there underling! Nice to see yo: "You're going to be attending my ARKS Battle Championship, right?"
"It's not like I'm just randomly throwing an event to start throwing people under the bus!"
"It was Regius' idea, but then he made me take over the planning."
"I know it's not the best time, but really it wasn't my idea! I have no idea why he decided this!"
"There are somethings you just have to see how they work out. You can't shy away fro trying anything!"
"If you're worried about something, you might as well go see how it works out."
"Alright, I'm off! Everyone, I'm counting on your support!"
